ValidationRule.description: If "Marketing Campaign" field is empty (i.e. not a “Marketing Contact‘), then “Status” field should remain blank and NOT be editable (except Admins) If "Marketing Campaign" is populated, then “Status” can be edited (by Contact Owner & Account hierarchy)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISBLANK(Campaign_Name__c), ISCHANGED(Status__c), $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'Global Process Admin Profile', $Profile.Name <> 'Nokia Admin Profile', $Profile.Name <> 'Data Loader Profile' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to edit the "Status" field when the Contact is not linked to a Marketing Campaign ("Marketing Campaign" is empty).
